channel.title: [SHARDS] Project No-Doze [SQL INTERGRATED] Excellent server
channel.description:
Project No-Doze
Note: The server is clean and has no dead code lingering around in it.
EXTRA NOTE: You must use the client provided, Its important as the server is setup with that client. If you do not the server will drop many many features. Anyway the client is nice and clean.
[img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/project%20no-doze/client.jpg[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/project%20no-doze/autocasting.jpg[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/ringofdueling.jpg[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/gloryteleport.jpg[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/amuletmaking1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/amuletmaking2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/project%20no-doze/multispells.jpg[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/project%20no-doze/woodcutting.jpg[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/project%20no-doze/teleports.png[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/project%20no-doze/pvpsafearea.jpg[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg69/killamess/project%20no-doze/pvparea.jpg[/img]
Features (Please note, There is only 1 combat system, Which runs both player and npc Hence Entity based. This also includes much more other bits that can be possible to run for player and npc.)
Skillcapes - All skillcapes have there actionDelays meaning they are set to busy whilst preforming the emotion. If a player is under attack while doing a emotion the hits will be delayed until they are set to not busy. ForceWalker - Allows you to walk a character to a certain location { x, y, z }. JailSystem - puts players in a temporary cell while the admin decides what they will do with the player. Ship travelling - Use the main ports to get around the map. Walk to then perform action - implemented for objects and npcs. ActionManager - An tick based system purposly built for this server. All Animations, Damages, Graphics and teleporting players have a built in delay system to allow delayed actions for the tasks mentioned. FightPits - viewing orbs work and player is invisable. Object Click system - Stores the last clicked object in an array so it can be used for skills to get certain details about the object. Personal pets - Atm you can only get the pet via ::buypet command, follows you around and picks up valuable items for you! plus stackable items. Market system (SQL) based - used to buy and sell items between players. All specials work. All spells are autocastable. saves last combat mode for melee and ranged. saves if you had autoretaliate on and running, will highight opon login if needed. npcs can walk futher than 1 square and can also change paths. no more bs npc drops, if you know what i mean, well you know what i mean. Fixed. Hits are stored into an array, then each cycle of the server it will check if its time to hit, if all the hit masks are currently used it will hold the attack for another cycle until it can hit the player. Real busy system, like how rs has, stops players from doing certain things while in busy mode. Glory teleporting - all real rs teleport locations, goes from (4) to uncharged. ring of duelling - all real rs teleport locations, goes from (8) to dust. ring of recoil. ring of life. dharok degrading. multi combat zones. PVP zones. (lumbridge) with a red skull. regular pking zones with a normal skull. tea stall thieving, gives exp and tea. trading with some dupes fixed. begun on duel arena - has duel sign, challenge option and all options work. no staking yet. all prayers work with thier correct features, all features effect the player how they should. bone burying. all food eating. potion drinking. Pk token system, used to buy PVP items from store. 100% accurate rs combat formulas, ranged and melee, with all the extra addons that you could ever need. (tested)
NPC COMBAT - Entity based.
Basically everything you could ever need for a combat system (Extremly nice combat) Complete npc tile system - no more standing on npcs whilst fighting (Exact to rs) Complete combat system with implemented SQL features to allow for ease of use when adding npc styles, attack levels etc.. 7 different combat states - Npcs can use 7 types of combat while fighting a player if selected Magic and ranging uses the Entity based system. Making a npc use a complete magic spell is as simple as putting in the spell id that you want it to use. Complete attack/defence system. delayed hits. no sidewards fighting in melee combat, either the npc or the player will move to the horizontal/vertical postion suitable. no standing on a npc whilst fighting - will move around until they are not on each other, they cannot attack while standing on each other either. and the rest that rs has.
PLAYER COMBAT - Entity based.
All spells - All correct animations/gfxs - All correct hits, Hit/splash system. I have created a "Magic book" which basically contains every spell in it, useable for both npcs and players!. Ranging, complete projectiles with arrow dropping and deleting, supports all knifes/darts/javelins/axes. All ranging styles change the delay for the attack. If you are using longranged you get defence exp aswel and range and hp exp. Saves your last combat mode, for both ranging and melee weapons, highlights correct combat tabs, this includes when you log in. No possibility to use a combat mode that a weapon doesnt have, If you were using str mode and switch to whip it will change your combat mode to attack , normally on rs it will switch to the closest combat mode that the weapon has, i decided pures hate switching to whip and it being controlled thus being the reason why it will change it to attack. player following basically everything pking on rs has this has. Multi hitting spells, hits up to 9 players or npcs or BOTH, if standing next to the enermy. All experience given in the server can be increased by two variables to make it fast to altar all skills experience rate or combat experience rate. SQL Benefits Can add npcs into the server without resets. Can update shops without resets. Can update npc drops without resets. Players need to register to play, registration page download provided at bottom of page.
SKILLS ADDED TO DATE
CRAFTING - GemCrafting Makes all items. Strings all amulets. Cuts gems.
- HideCrafting makes all dragon hide items tans all items.
- Pottery makes soft clay.
FISHING catches multiple fish if level requires are met. uses correct gear and deletes correct items if needed.
HERBLORE Cleans all herbs Makes 11 different potions
MINING mines multiple rocks adds random gems
THEIVING pickpocketing from main npcs.
WOODCUTTING cuts regular - magic trees gives logs
arggghhhh theres just so much more stuff in this server, everything has been made to the best of my ability and to be as lag free as possible The server startup time is 1 second, including loading all the sql bits.
THINGS REQUIRED
Xammp Installer(66MB) - http://www.apachefriends.org/download.php?xampp-win32-1.7.4-VC6-installer.exe ZIP(123MB) - http://www.apachefriends.org/download.php?xampp-win32-1.7.4-VC6.zip 7zip(56MB) - http://www.apachefriends.org/download.php?xampp-win32-1.7.4-VC6.7z
Server and client bundle. Multiupload.com - http://www.multiupload.com/E1PWI0CBX2
SQL Database. Multiupload.com - http://www.multiupload.com/EHQDU24ZRP
Registration pages. Multiupload.com - http://www.multiupload.com/SU8H1I3QE0
Eclipse (windows) 32 bit version(99MB) - http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/technology/epp/downloads/release/helios/SR2/eclipse-java-helios-SR2-win32.zip 64 bit version(99MB) - http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/technology/epp/downloads/release/helios/SR2/eclipse-java-helios-SR2-win32-x86_64.zip
How to get this server running.
First, Download Xammp here Installer(66MB) - http://www.apachefriends.org/download.php?xampp-win32-1.7.4-VC6-installer.exe ZIP(123MB) - http://www.apachefriends.org/download.php?xampp-win32-1.7.4-VC6.zip 7zip(56MB) - http://www.apachefriends.org/download.php?xampp-win32-1.7.4-VC6.7z
When installing you will see an option to install "Apache" "MySql" and "FileZilla", click both Apache and MySql. once installed open the xammp Control panel and click the Admin button next to Apache. Open phpmyadmin and create a new database, Calls this runescape. Next click the runescape database and then click the SQL button
Download the database - http://www.multiupload.com/EHQDU24ZRP
open and extract the runescape.sql file to you desktop, open it and select it all and copy it, Go back to phpmyadmin and paste all in the sql bit. Then click the button to update it. If done correctly you should see a database called runescape with multiple tables in it such as, characters, banks etc. Now setting up the registration page.
Download the 2 pages from here - http://www.multiupload.com/SU8H1I3QE0
Open the downloaded file and extract the 2 php files into your Xammp/htdocs folder. Now you will need to create a password
Open phpmyadmin, To open phpmyadmin, go to xammp control panel then click admin next to apache. Now go to security, set a password, then serverside navigate your way to src/com/rs2/mysql/Mysql.java in there find
private static String pass = "";
in the "" add the password you just made. now go to Xammp/htdocs/regaction.php open that up and find
$password_db = "";
add the password into that aswel. You can view these pages by going to - http://127.0.0.1/register.php You must portforward port 80 for others to view these! and instead of 127.0.0.1 it must be your ip address. Now for the server i highly recommend using Eclipse for programming the server
32 bit version(99MB) - http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/technology/epp/downloads/release/helios/SR2/eclipse-java-helios-SR2-win32.zip 64 bit version(99MB) - http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/technology/epp/downloads/release/helios/SR2/eclipse-java-helios-SR2-win32-x86_64.zip
install eclipse, once installed it will ask for a workstation location, this location must be your extracted folder of the server. extract the server folder onto your desktop or where ever, Go back to the workstation location and link it your server folder and click ok eclipse should completely load the server. Basically now your done, run the client and run the server to login, make sure SQL and Apache are both running. Post errors and i will try and help fix them.
Credits -
Shards revolution team. Ultimate for the base (ultimate scape) Extremely basic and empty. Steven for bits of the sql and market system. Me for the rest.

item.title: [SHARDS] Project No-Doze [SQL INTERGRATED] Excellent server
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

I just wrote a compiler for Project No-Doze. Feel free to add it to the original post.

@echo Off title compiler "C:\Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_16/bin/javac.exe" -classpath ./libs/mysql-connector.jar;libs/xpp.jar;libs/xstream.jar -d ./bin ./src/com/rs2/*.java src/com/rs2/content/*.java src/com/rs2/content/actions/*.java src/com/rs2/content/actions/tasks/*.java src/com/rs2/content/controllers/*.java src/com/rs2/content/minigames/*.java src/com/rs2/content/objects/*.java src/com/rs2/content/personalnpc/*.java src/com/rs2/content/skills/cooking/*.java src/com/rs2/content/skills/crafting/*.java src/com/rs2/content/skills/fishing/*.java src/com/rs2/content/skills/herblore/*.java src/com/rs2/content/skills/mining/*.java src/com/rs2/content/skills/thieving/*.java src/com/rs2/eventmanager/*.java src/com/rs2/gameevents/*.java src/com/rs2/market/*.java src/com/rs2/eventmanager/*.java src/com/rs2/model/*.java src/com/rs2/model/combat/*.java src/com/rs2/model/combat/content/*.java src/com/rs2/model/combat/magic/*.java src/com/rs2/model/combat/melee/*.java src/com/rs2/model/combat/ranged/*.java src/com/rs2/model/npc/*.java src/com/rs2/model/player/*.java src/com/rs2/model/player/commandmanager/*.java src/com/rs2/model/player/commandmanager/commands/*.java src/com/rs2/model/player/packetmanager/*.java src/com/rs2/model/player/packetmanager/packets/*.java src/com/rs2/mysql/*.java src/com/rs2/net/*.java src/com/rs2/tiles/*.java src/com/rs2/util/*.java src/com/rs2/util/log/*.java src/com/rs2/world/*.java pause

[quote=“Rich Dude99, post:88, topic:387829”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=483627.msg3557499#msg3557499 date=1302015469]
I had this exact same problem until it suddenly started working. I would check everywhere that needs a password and make sure they are exactly matched, then check that your database names are a match, and then check your status on the Apache Admin and see what is and what is not activated.

I know it’s daunting the very first time you use SQL.
[/quote]

Thanks for the suggestions… I went through, with a new password, and tried to update the database, but nothing proved successful. I check the status page, as you suggested, and all were activated except: SMTP Service, FTP Service, Tomcat Service. Should those be deactivated, or how do I activate them if needed?

If not this, then I’m lost… any other suggestions?[/quote]
OP doesn’t say but I didn’t get it working until this: Go to C:\xampp\FileZillaFTP and then double click the “FileZillaFTP_start” batch file to start the FTP service.

Then you can start it in your Control Panel, and then that TomCat thing I can’t remember how I did (I think it was in XAMPP Control Panel > Apache Admin). I couldn’t get it running until these were started, although it doesn’t explain to do that.

Read full topic

I would check everywhere that needs a password and make sure they are exactly matched, then check that your database names are a match, and then check your status on the Apache Admin and see what is and what is not activated.

I know it’s daunting the very first time you use SQL.[/quote]

I check the status page, as you suggested, and all were activated except: SMTP Service, FTP Service, Tomcat Service. Should those be deactivated, or how do I activate them if needed?

If not this, then I’m lost… any other suggestions?
